Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]

sentences.english: However, due to some reasons, it has not gained deserved attention.
sentences.chinese: 然而由於種種原因，元曲的介紹並未得到應有的關注。

sentences.english: The main literary achievement in the Yuan Dynasty was Yuan drama.
sentences.chinese: 元朝文學的主要成就是元曲。

sentences.english: Why we say "the most natural for the Chinese Yuan Dynasty Literature"?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼說“元曲爲中國最自然之文學”？

sentences.english: It resembles Chanda of Song Dynasty and operas of Yuan Dynasty in structure.
sentences.chinese: 其曲體結構與宋代的纏達和元曲的結構也有相似之處。

sentences.english: Great literature, ancient and modern, have used a natural win, while the Mo in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 古今之大文學，無不以自然勝，而莫著於元曲。
